name: Just A Shooter
description:
Just a simple endless platformer shooter that i made, mostly because i wanted to finally finish a game



some stuff that is in this game:
- Guns
- more guns (5)
- 4 types of enemies
- dashing, jumping and moving
- highscore
- some sounds



probaly will add some more features like:
- different skins
- more guns
- more enemies and levels
- music
- more sounds
- settings
- more sprites

any tips would be cool
